definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="78" y="99"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="stop_block_animation"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="block_animation"><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:close</field><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
